description: Weekly online quizzes released throughout the term to assess understanding of material. Includes graded quizzes in Weeks 1-9 and ungraded revision quizzes. Computer-marked with immediate feedback.
45-minute computer-based test in Week 5 covering topics 1-3. Questions resemble weekly quiz style. Instant marks with detailed feedback in tutorials.
45-minute computer-based test in Week 9 covering topics 4-6. Follows similar format to weekly quizzes. Immediate results and tutorial feedback.
2-hour comprehensive exam during official university examination period. Tests problem-solving skills across all course topics including lectures and tutorials.
